rule.name: EAP_SetValueForRunTimeSchedulerDetail
rule.description: Hold set value rule for run time scheduler details
rule.definition: if( and( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!runConfigId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!processId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!processModelUUid ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!triggerTime ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!createdOn ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!modifiedBy ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!triggerDate ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!calendarId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!schedulerTriggerTime ) ), ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail, 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:eap}EAP_T_RunTimeSchedulerDetail'( run_time_scheduler_detail_id:if(ri!isNullPrimaryKey=true(),null, if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetailId),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"run_time_scheduler_detail_id",{}),ri!runTimeSchedulerDetailId)), run_config_id: if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!runConfigId),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"run_config_id",{}),ri!runConfigId), process_id:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!processId),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"process_id",{}),ri!processId), calendar_id:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!calendarId),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"calendar_id",{}),ri!calendarId), trigger_time:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!triggerTime),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"trigger_time",{}),ri!triggerTime), next_trigger_datetime:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!nextTriggerDatetime),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"next_trigger_datetime",{}),ri!nextTriggerDatetime), next_trigger_datetime_gmt:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!nextTriggerDatetimeGmt),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"next_trigger_datetime_gmt",{}),ri!nextTriggerDatetimeGmt), process_model_uuid:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!processModelUUid),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"process_model_uuid",{}),ri!processModelUUid), trigger_date:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!triggerDate),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"trigger_date",{}),ri!triggerDate), is_scheduler_triggered:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!isSchedulerTriggered),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"is_scheduler_triggered",{}),ri!isSchedulerTriggered), remarks:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!remarks),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"remarks",{}),ri!remarks), is_active:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!isActive),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"is_active",{}),ri!isActive), created_by:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!createdBy),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"created_by",{}),ri!createdBy), created_on:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!createdOn),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"created_on",{}),ri!createdOn), modified_by:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!modifiedBy),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"modified_by",{}),ri!modifiedBy), modified_on:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!modifiedOn),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"modified_on",{}),ri!modifiedOn), scheduler_trigger_time:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!schedulerTriggerTime),index(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetail,"scheduler_trigger_time",{}),ri!schedulerTriggerTime) ) )
